title: Social Media Lead Generation Specialist (Real Estate – Full Time, Remote)
job_overview:
Please review this job post completely before applying.

Job Title: Social Media Lead Generation Specialist
Type: Full-Time
Hours: 45 hrs/week 
Location: Remote
Salary: Based on experience — open to serious candidates who can deliver results
Start Date: Immediate (within 1 week)

About Us :

We are a fast-growing real estate investment and property management company based in the U.S., focused on acquiring and managing rental and investment properties. We are currently building out our digital outreach team and are looking for a full-time specialist who can help us drive traffic and generate leads through social media action — not just content management.

What You’ll Be Doing (Daily):

Your job is to create traffic and bring in leads by being active online — posting, engaging, and promoting our business.

Core Responsibilities :

– Create and manage company social profiles: Facebook, LinkedIn, Instagram, TikTok
– Join 30+ Facebook groups related to real estate, landlords, FSBO, investors, etc.
– Post daily in groups with customized outreach (you’ll get guidance and examples)
– Promote our services, listings, or lead magnets to generate real engagement
– Reply to comments, messages, and DMs
– Track and document all warm leads and send to the sales team

Weekly Reporting :

– Posts made
– Groups reached
– Responses generated
– Leads handed off

Requirements :

– Strong experience using Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn (posting & group engagement)
– Must know how to create simple image or video posts (Canva, CapCut, or similar)
– Prior experience generating inbound leads using social media (not paid ads)
– Good written English and fast response time
– Highly motivated, reliable, and independent
– Real estate experience is a bonus, but not required

Why You’ll Love Working With Us :

– Long-term full-time position (not freelance)
– Friendly, structured work environment
– Opportunity to grow with the company into senior roles
– We reward results — if you bring leads, we’ll support you fully
